mentoring program is to make accent on the practice in contrast to theoretical knowledge. Also, as it's not possible to cover all topics of the platform and be prepared for everything, so we teach how to concentrate on the ability to search information in the SAP documentation and any other available resources. This program will take you 6 weeks. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We suppose that during this program you
